data.title: CountryHouse at Council Bluffs
data.meta_description: Read 4 reviews, see photos, get pricing, and compare CountryHouse at Council Bluffs with other senior living facilities near Council Bluffs.
data.text:
At Country House Residence for Memory Care, seniors receive comprehensive care from a knowledgeable care team. Through compassionate services, residents are enabled to live fulling lives in a comfortable homelike setting. The care team dedicates time to getting to know residents and providing them with an experience that caters to their health and lifestyle needs.

Care and services at CountryHouse include assistance with daily living care activities in addition to special memory care services. The memory care facility has indoor and outdoor amenities that enable residents to stay social and engaged with staff and residents. In addition to on-site services, the care team can also take residents to appointments. The care team also provides support and communication to residents' family members as well.

The staff at CountryHouse dedicates time to planning eventful and interactive activities and events for residents weekly. Activities promote interaction and socialization within the community.

State licensing information

To explore the licensing information and compliance histories of senior living communities in the state of Iowa, visit the Iowa Health Facility Database.

A Place for Mom has scored CountryHouse at Council Bluffs 9 out of 10 using our proprietary review score.

We assign review scores to give a more reliable view into senior living communities and home care agencies. Our review scores prioritize reviews that are recent — the past 24 months — because we know families need current information when choosing senior care.

Those with many recent, positive reviews receive a high review score, while providers with few recent reviews — regardless of how positive — receive a lower review score. Communities with no recent reviews will not have a review score, even if older reviews are positive. The maximum A Place for Mom review score a community can receive is 10 points.
